price: Da Allah zna da od njih može biti ikakva dobra, učinio bi da čuju, a da je učinio i da čuju, oni bi se, opet, okrećući se od toga udaljili.
arabic: وَلَوۡ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا لَّأَسۡمَعَهُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaw ʿalima al-lahu fīhim khayran la-asmaʿahum walaw asmaʿahum latawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
translations: surely, He (would) have made them hear
surely they would have turned away
